ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the unemployed phone 2 field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(Unemployed_Phone_2__c) && NOT(ISNULL(Unemployed_Phone_2__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Unemployed_Phone_2__c)) && !REGEX(Unemployed_Phone_2__c ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(Unemployed_Phone_2__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Unemployed_Phone_2__c)) && !REGEX(Unemployed_Phone_2__c ,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for unemployed phone 2. The minimum number of digits should be 10
